issue_obverse_figure_s: Right profile of Ohrmazd II on frontal bust
issue_obverse_figure_description_s: crown with eagle's head holding a pearl in its beak and terminating in wing at the back; covered korymbos, two ribbons commencing to the left below the korymbos, pointing upwards; plain diadem, diadem ribbon commencing above ball hair pointing upwards; earing consisting of two elements; neck-line of tunica edged with a row of pearls; double line embellished with a row of pearls running from the shoulders to the breast ornament (the latter not visible); dotted border
issue_obverse_legend_s: unclear; triplet under bird's beak (SNS 2, var.17)
issue_reverse_figure_description_s: base consisting of two elements; square altar shaft; altar ribbons across shaft,to the left and the right of the shaft ribbons pointing downwards, to the left and right one dot; three altar slabs; above bust with diadem, elaborate coiffure and two balls of hair facing front, surrounded by altar flames; to the left of the altar attendant with stylized crown of Ohrmazd II, holding a barsom in both hands, to the right of the altar attendant ting on his scabbard, to the right of the altar attendant with stylized crown of Ahuramazda, holding a barsom in both hands, right , both facing inwards; dotted border
